level.heading: VENDING LOCATIONS[COLON] MOBILE ROADWAY VENDING LOCATIONS[COLON] APPLICATION FOREW LOCATIONS (ยง 24-536)

level.text: A person may submit a request to the DCRA Director to create a new designated MRV location, provided that the person specifies a location that is not in conflict with the above standards. All requests are subject to DCRA and DDOT review and approval.
